name: Control Is An Illusion (Yernemm)
description:
Control is an Illusion

Submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

Jam theme: "Out of Control"

Controls:

  • Move: W A S D
  • Look: Mouse
  • Jump: Space
  • Interact: Left Mouse Button
  • Close game: Esc

TIP: Hold space to keep jumping. This will make you move much faster so you can reach buttons in time, but you have less control of player movement when you do that.

You must configure a number of control panels to prevent the building from blowing up. It's simple enough, each of them just needs one of 3 correct coloured buttons to be pressed. The pattern is even shown to you! The only problem is, it isn't just you in control. When your adversary takes over, you black out and it's up to you to figure out what the other entity just did and fix it before it takes over again.

All the models and visuals and stuff are made by me. I've also made all of the two sounds in the entire game in Bosca Ceoil.
